name: awsdr
description: a [scriptable] command line to make disaster recovery simple and automated

scripts.watch: ls -d test/* lib/* lib/**/* | grep -v 'node_modules' | grep .es6 | xargs ./node_modules/.bin/babel -d ./lib ./src -w
scripts.build: ls -d test/* lib/* lib/**/* | grep -v 'node_modules' | grep .es6 | xargs ./node_modules/.bin/babel -d ./lib ./src

author: Jame Mackson <jame.mackson@gmail.com>
